title: Charge transport through the multiple end zigzag edge states of armchair graphene nanoribbons and heterojunctions
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,20113-20119
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02574A, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
David M. T. Kuo
This comprehensive study investigates charge transport through the multiple end zigzag edge states of finite-size armchair graphene nanoribbons/boron nitride nanoribbons junctions under a longitudinal electric field.
